body:
# ASGARDEX v1.41.5

Added Trade Deposit from L1 chains. Test with small amounts first. Trade asset swaps are fee-less now for both Mayachain & Thorchain. Many small fixes and UI improvements.  

## What's Changed
* feat: tx slideshow by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/941
* add LUSD to default assets and fix const errors by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/943
* fix ledger only mode issues by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/942
* chore: hide synth from asset select by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/945
* update xchainjs package & fix arbitrum fee issue by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/946
* resolve chainflip channel ID tracking issue by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/947
* feat: swap view optimization by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/948
* chore: cleanup unused modules by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/950
* update url for Thorchain node addreses by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/951
* removes affiliate fees from tradeswaps for Thorchain & mayachain by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/952
* Trade deposit by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/955
* fixed unstake, slider & added more info by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/957
* chore: enhance bonds view by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/958
* prepare for new release by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/959

ASGARDEX v1.41.4  

Recent Asgardex Desktop updates added custom ERC20 support, Chainflip boost, CACAO pool UI, synth mint warnings (Mayachain deprecating synths so redeem immediately), improved token imports, fixed i18n and minor visuals.

## What's Changed
* add custom erc20 support by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/927
* chore: add warning for synth mint by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/929
* chore: update import tokens ui by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/932
* chore: add cacao pool ui by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/931
* chore: fix missing i18ns by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/935
* chore: hide the chain icon for open state of collapse by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/936
* udpate aggregator package & add boost option for chainflip by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/937
* update & add changelog by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/938


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.41.3...v1.41.4

#ASGARDEX v1.41.3  

We had to cut this emergency release due to Ankr RPC provider no longer being a viable option. It was causing connection issues and degraded performance for BSC (Binance Smart Chain) and AVAX (Avalanche) networks.
   
## What's Changed
* Update to default gas prices, loading smoothed out for trade assets by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/924
* switching rpc providers for BSC & AVAX by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/925
* Ready for new release by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/926


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.41.2...v1.41.3

# ASGARDEX v1.41.2  
 Features

  Solana Ledger Support

  - Added full Ledger hardware wallet integration for Solana (#920)
    - Address derivation and transaction signing via Ledger
    - Updated wallet selection views with Solana Ledger option

  Component Architecture Improvements

  - Removed styled-components from codebase (#915)
    - Refactored components to use modern styling approach
    - Updated asset-related components, forms, and views

  Developer Experience

  - Added Prettier Tailwind CSS plugin (#921)
  - Updated core dependencies and packages

   Bug Fixes

  - ChainFlip: Fixed fee calculation issues (#922)
  - TRON USDT: Resolved send form bugs and updated quotes to use liquidity-based calculations (#918)
  - Fees: Fixed fee calculation and added send state management (#909)
  - Asset Switching: Improved asset switch logic (#919)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.41.1...v1.41.2

#ASGARDEX v1.41.1  
* Chainflip tracking added 
* Mayachain ledger added. Use the Thorchain ledger (device) app
* Tron ledger added
* Xrp ledger added 

## What's Changed
* add chainflip tracking components and logic by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/907
* Chore/chainflip updates by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/908
* fix fee issue & add send state to send.shared by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/909
* added ledger mayachain & removed old .d.ts files by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/910
* update build params by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/911
* Chore/handle-swap errors & smooth input experience by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/913


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.41.0...v1.41.1

# ASGARDEX v1.41.0 Very exited to release a dedicated tracking feature in Asgardex. ## What's Changed * chore: package cleanup by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/898 * chore: antd last cleanup by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/900 * update gaia to use inbound address for swap fees by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/899 * transaction tracking for thorchain by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/896 * Feature/add client tron by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/902 * add proper staple & bump aggregator package by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/904 * feat: unified send form by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/903 * update send form logic & add XRP destination tag feature by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/905 * prepare for release by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/906 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.40.9...v1.41.0 ## The following binaries have been signed by THORChain/ASGARDEX admins listed at [admin-gpg](https://github.com/thorchain/Resources/blob/master/admin-GPG-keys.md) dfcb930650226c0be3e7176afdee38def3c9b5288ace8d68f0ac09a45ba13fdb ASGARDEX-1.41.0-linux.AppImage 7c83c90a4826a328925a699ef57d7a300ebcf475d563d93e3cd9558d908dbfb2 ASGARDEX-1.41.0-linux.deb 73587311f29b9a54d76e623ef6ad8363af7697b42b3ef2698e32fb4078590417 ASGARDEX-1.41.0-mac-13-Ventura.dmg 375c6b0dca3babf404e0fe29f8ff0b1f71cd14d996eb6532c0428cc6858a9c46 ASGARDEX-1.41.0-mac-14-Sonoma.dmg eda69318e8c209b98358718d1cd608d48d98dc8d04c8bfdd00e58317445bc627 ASGARDEX-1.41.0-mac-15-Sequoia.dmg bc193ebe1f8954d9706b9c720d467ab2d4e5b8d887a23686c17496cb810cc737 ASGARDEX-1.41.0-win.exe

# Asgardex v1.40.6 

## What's Changed
* fix edge cases by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/826
* clean up imports of ledgerhq packages by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/707

* update locale settings by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/836

* fix dev issues by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/841
* update for release, change default slip to 5% by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/834
* refactor bal logic by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/843
